thread.title: Denver native Ana Cabrera named anchor of CNN Newsroom weekends
thread.title_full: Denver native Ana Cabrera named anchor of CNN Newsroom weekends

author: Joanne Ostrow
title: Denver native Ana Cabrera named anchor of CNN Newsroom weekends
text:
Chris Berman changing role at ESPN 
CNN announced Cabrera will succeed Poppy Harlow, who will now co-host CNN Newsroom weekdays.She will anchor CNN Newsroom from New York on Saturdays from 1 to 4 p.m. and 5 to 7 p.m. MT, and Sundays from 3 to 6 p.m. MT, according to the press release. 
Cabrera joined CNN as a correspondent in 2013 and was most recently part of the networkâ€™s investigative team. The weekend prime time post has become a jumping off point to a bigger platform; previous weekend anchor Don Lemon now anchors a prime time weeknight show. 
Cabrera was a 7News morning anchor 2009-13, after which she helped launch the four-person CNN regional bureau in Denver. 217
